title: AFK jungle meta?
body:
Recently in the last week or so moreso, i've noticed that afk jungle has become the new meta. 
Why?

Unless im jungling, the usual jungle gets to 3-6 then afks because "against my religion to win". Religions clearly Trollism hue. Or some other BS reason. 
Now this is what im finding ridiculous. Its perfectly okay to do this, but god forbid if you call people out for it. 

Seriously, how tf is trolling, int feeding and afking ok, but not wanting that BS in our game is against everything people stand for?

replies.body:
The rising salt levels have slowly been driving jungle mains from ranked, leading to more autofills.  These autofills, sensing the rage of a declined gank tend to mute all and powerfarm so as not to get raged at and reported because top lane riven decided to flash-ignite darius under tower at lvl 3 and give firstblood.

Try not raging at junglers when ganks fail, and hope the jungle mains stay and we don't have the awful old era of yi vs jax powerfarming jungle to see which powercarry gets more fed by the time their team is crumbling.
Better to mute and concentrate on mid, bot, or objectives.

AFK farm is common among inexprience jgl players. They cant see kill potential any where on the map, so they rush farming lv6, or items. Which is really bad as it offer no preasure or even vision, most of the time those nubs wont even buy pink.
